summary:
The dream has always been to work with cutting-edge technology. Data science gave me that. I love breaking down data, creating algorithms, doing deep analysis and developing solutions that generate real profit for the client.

Engineer for 20 years, I made my career in the Brazilian industry, working in national and multinational companies. I moved from junior process engineer to operations manager, at some point with over 5,000 subordinates.

I got to know the world, I took courses in the United States and Norway, and I visited many other countries and cultures. But the desire to work in technology propelled me to a drastic career change at the age of 45.

In May '22, I left my industrial executive position to pioneer the data science and machine learning market. I opened my company - wmazza - and I develop data solutions for companies in the region and in other states of the federation.

I have a graduate and postgraduate degree from Escola Politecnica da USP, I have an MBA in Finance from IBMEC, in addition to the postgraduate course that changed my life forever: Big Data and Data Science. And now, one more challenge: completing a Master's Degree in Applied Computing.

My mission is to show clients the treasure hidden in their tangles of data, and how it is possible to bring them to light without spending an extra real for it.

I also do lives and produce courses to teach Excel, Power BI and Python, for professionals who want to work with data, and maybe migrate to the technology area. I even have a YouTube channel - Data Monster - with over 100 Python knowledge videos.

My motto is DDD: data makes money (in Portuguese it makes sense). I mean, just like the cow doesn't give milk, it's necessary to go get the data, and extract valuable information hidden under the rug.

If your business isn't making money from data, it's already losing money. Are you going to leave them there 'eternally lying in a splendid cradle' (reference to the Brazilian national anthem)? Hope not!

I am from São Paulo in Santa Catarina, but thanks to the possibilities of technology, I can work in any region of the country or the world.

My professional experience, combined with my academic background, certainly makes me qualified to run a company whose only objective is to generate tangible and immediate value for customers.
headline: Engineer | Data Scientist | Master's student in Computing
